* Supporting with a range of transformative data \& analytics projects that would contribute to the optimization of HR processes and systems. Some of these projects include CSRD Reporting, Data and Dashboard Quality, and Data Governance.

**About You:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Business Administration, HR, or related field.
* Proven experience in data analysis or a similar role within an HR context.
* Proficiency with Workday and Workday Reporting Writer.
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.
* Proficiency in data analysis \& visualization tools (SQL, Excel, PowerBI).
* Excellent written and spoken English communication skills to interact with global stakeholders.

**What We offer:**

* A temporary contract to cover maternity leave.
* Enjoy the flexibility of a 40\-hour work week with the option to negotiate reduced hours.
* Benefit from a competitive remuneration package, complete with a good pension scheme.
* Take charge of your own projects and explore ample development opportunities within Nutreco.
* A flexible work environment with the option to work from home max 2 days per week.

**Next Steps:**


We value a seamless candidate's experience and would like to respond within five (5\) business days. The hiring process typically takes 4\-6 weeks. For more information, please contact Eniola Apara at eniola.apara@nutreco.com. We appreciate your interest in joining our mission to innovate and sustainably shape the future of food production.
company_addresses:
Global Nutreco headquarters
Stationsstraat 77, Amersfoort 

(Parking: Smallepad 46, Amersfoort)

P.O. Box 299
3800 AG Amersfoort
The Netherlands
Phone: +31 (0)88 053 2405
company_description: Nutreco’s over 12,000 dedicated employees in 40 countries across the globe relentlessly pursue our purpose of Feeding the Future in a way that ensures sustainability is front and centre in all we do.

title: Data Analyst - Insight Generation for High-Tech Strategy
description:
Netherlands Data Science Eindhoven Hybrid
Turn data into actionable insights and drive strategic decisions in the high\-tech industry.

  


About The Member Company
We are a global high\-tech consultancy company with a team of entrepreneurial engineers, scientists, and digital experts from around the world. Together we form a fast\-growing and proud community. We offer consultancy services to high\-profile clients globally in diverse service areas, such as:


* Technology \& Engineering
* Energy \& Renewables
* Life sciences \& Pharma
* Digital \& IT
**About this vacancy**
----------------------


As a Data Analyst at TMC Data Science, you will transform raw data into actionable insights that guide strategic decision\-making in the high\-tech industry. You will create dashboards and visualizations that simplify complex data and support innovation through trend analysis and forecasting.


Key Responsibilities:

* Analyze data to identify patterns, trends, and opportunities.
* Develop intuitive dashboards and reports for stakeholders.
* Conduct trend analysis and create predictive models.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to understand business needs.
* Present findings in a clear and impactful manner.


**What we expect from you**
---------------------------


* Bachelor’s or Msc degree in Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, or related fields.
* 3\-5 years of experience in data analysis or business intelligence.
* Proficiency in visualization tools like Power BI, Tableau, or Qlik.
* Strong analytical and communication skills.
* Knowledge of the high\-tech industry is a plus.


**What you can expect from us**
-------------------------------


TMC is an international high\-tech consultancy company that brings expertise to their clients in order to support them with the realization of their technological challenges. As such, TMC is operating as an expert center at the disposition of its clients and we help them to be more competitive in an ever more global and faster changing technological world.


At TMC we believe that people are the driving force behind technological innovation. That is why we want to create the best possible conditions for tech talents to thrive in. We offer you a challenging and stimulating work environment in which you can be the director of your own career.


As an Employeneur you are part of our TMC family. Next to our outstanding technical expertise, fun and engagement are meaningful parts of our culture.


The 5 basic principles of **employeneurship**
A long\-term working relationship
Enjoy the security of a long\-term contract and a stable source of income while getting the opportunity to work at diverse projects.


Individual profit sharing
Full transparency. That’s it. For each of your projects, you know your hourly rate, your costs, and your individual performance\-based profit sharing, all in order to stimulate your inner entrepreneur.


Business cells
Our employeneurs are grouped in business cells based on their technical expertise. They are small, focused and function as high\-grade knowledge networks. And as buzzing communities of close colleagues.


YOUniversity
Every employeneur drives their own career. Together, we make a plan for personal and professional growth. Receive personal coaching and an extensive training budget to keep developing yourself and deliver outperformance at our clients.

  

The Entrepreneurial Lab
Work on your technical dreams in our lab. Collaborate with others in multidisciplinary teams to unlock out\-of\-the\-box thinking and innovative ideas as well as entrepreneurial skills.
company_description: At TMC we believe it's people who drive technology. Our Employeneurship model creates the best conditions for technical talents to do so.

title: Senior AI Expert 100% Remote (m/f/d)
description:
**Are you a highly skilled AI engineer with a passion to support in creating and maintaining AI tools?**  

  

**Who is Digistore24?**


Join one of Europe’s fastest\-growing tech companies, dedicated to shaping the digital future. We empower entrepreneurs worldwide by providing innovative e\-commerce solutions and expert guidance to help them turn their visions into successful businesses. Our company is built on a foundation of creativity, innovation, and a passion for technology. At Digistore24, you’ll be a part of a vibrant, forward\-thinking team that values individuality, sustainability, and collaboration while working to make a real impact in the digital landscape from anywhere you call home.

**Your new dream job**

* **Creating AI Applications Tailored to Business Use Cases Using OpenAI:** Design and implement advanced AI applications leveraging the OpenAI platform to address specific business challenges in areas such as customer and vendor support.
* **Integrating AI Applications into Existing Business Infrastructure:** Collaborate closely with the IT team to seamlessly integrate OpenAI\-powered functionalities into existing corporate systems and workflows.
* **Monitoring and Maintaining AI Applications:** Monitor the performance of deployed AI applications, ensuring they run efficiently and accurately, and implement regular updates and optimizations as necessary.
* **Data Analysis and Processing:** Process, analyze, and visualize large datasets to generate insights that are critical for fine\-tuning AI application performance and informing strategic decisions.
* **Participating in Training and Development Programs:** Actively engage in ongoing training to stay informed about the latest developments in AI, particularly within the OpenAI ecosystem, and continuously enhance technical expertise
* **Demonstrate Strategic Business Thinking**: You are product\-minded and take ownership of your work. You want to understand the problem, the business case, and make pragmatic decisions.

 **Your benefits at Digistore24**


You will play a crucial role in shaping our cutting\-edge projects in our collaborative work environment – while enjoying flexibility in working time and location.

* Enjoy the flexibility of working from your home office, provided you have uninterrupted internet access
* Benefit from regular further education and continuous learning opportunities
* Experience the stability of a highly successful German high\-tech company, funded by its product success and not by its investors
* Regular **further education**
* The **stability** of an extremely successful German high\-tech company that is **funded by its successful product** and not by investors
* Work in outcome\-focused teams with a culture of direct feedback
* **Modern equipment:** Utilize modern equipment in a flexible and international work setting
* International, **collaborative team** with strong cohesion
* Engage in spectacular Engage in spectacular team events across various European countries. across various European countries
* Enjoy **autonomy from day one**, with a friendly, informal atmosphere.
* Work in your **team on a first\-name basis**, without a dress code, and at eye level
* **Flexible working hours** from Mondays to Fridays
* **Flat hierarchies** and **short decision\-making paths**: our co\-founders are part of our team \- we operate on our own without external investors and reinvest everything we generate
* **Regular on\-the\-job training** \- You decide for yourself what you need for your further development, in consultation with the team lead
* **Personal responsibility** from day one: With us, you are not a cog in the system, but an important part of an A\-player team and are personally encouraged (and challenged!) by the team lead, including in monthly one\-on\-one meetings

 **Your superpower**

* **Analytical and Solution\-Oriented Thinking:** Strong ability to systematically analyze complex problems and develop effective solutions using critical thinking and structured approaches.
* **Passion for AI and Data Science:** High enthusiasm for AI powered applications and data science, with ongoing efforts to stay updated on trends and technologies in AI.
* **Project Management:** Experience in organizing and executing projects efficiently and goal\-oriented, with the ability to plan and deliver autonomously.
* **Communication Skills:** Excellent verbal and written communication abilities to convey technical information clearly to colleagues and stakeholders.
* **Flexibility and Willingness to Take on Challenges:** Openness to handle tasks outside core expertise when needed, showing motivation and contributing to team goals in unfamiliar areas.
* **Robust Software):** Strong ability to write clean, maintainable, and well\-documented Python code following best practices, including testing, version control, and modular design principles, to ensure the robustness and scalability of AI applications.
* **OpenAI API (Developing AI Applications with OpenAI):** Extensive experience in utilizing the OpenAI API to create and fine\-tune AI applications tailored to business use cases, including prompt engineering, model customization, and integration.
* **FastAPI (Deploying AI Applications via Documented API Endpoints):** Expertise in developing and maintaining API interfaces with FastAPI for securely and efficiently deploying OpenAI\-powered applications.
* **SQL, SQLAlchemy \& Pandas (Database Management):** Proficient in handling relational databases using SQL and SQLAlchemy. Skilled in data manipulation and extraction using Pandas for supporting AI\-driven applications and decision\-making.
* **Visualization Tools (Data Analysis and Insights):** Advanced skills in creating visual representations of data insights using tools like Matplotlib and Seaborn, aiding in business decision\-making and AI performance monitoring.

**This position is NOT right for you if you:**

* **…lack practical experience with AI application development and the OpenAI ecosystem.** This job requires hands\-on expertise in designing, deploying, and optimizing AI solutions using the OpenAI platform.
* **…are not willing to continuously learn and stay updated with the latest advancements in AI technology.** The AI field evolves rapidly, and ongoing learning is essential to remain effective and innovative in this role.
* **…struggle with working independently and taking initiative.** This position demands a high level of autonomy, problem\-solving skills, and proactive engagement with tasks and challenges.
* **…are inflexible about adapting to shifting priorities and contributing beyond your core responsibilities.** Flexibility to tackle diverse tasks and collaborate across functional boundaries is crucial for team success.
* **…have difficulty explaining technical concepts clearly to team members and stakeholders.** Effective communication, especially the ability to convey complex AI\-related topics in an understandable way, is key for this role.
* ... do not identify with **our values**

**Our values**  

https://careers.digistore24\.com/en/culture\-and\-core\-values


Please take a REALLY close look at the values. Are you ready to live them?

title: SEO Specialist
description:
We are looking for an SEO Specialist to drive organic growth through strategic on\- and off\-page SEO. You will optimize performance, conduct SEO audits, collaborate with teams, and turn data into actionable insights. If you're passionate about SEO and results\-driven, join us!


**The team**  

You will join the Marketing department, which consists of multiple teams focused on driving growth to the platform through omnichannel marketing and rapid experimentation for the HousingAnywhere group and its three brands: HousingAnywhere, Studapart, and Kamernet.



The teams are responsible for various domains: Content, Public Relations, SEO, Performance Marketing, Strategic Partnerships, CLM, and Product Marketing.

  


**Your role and impact**


* Driving continuous SEO growth by developing and implementing the SEO strategy primarily for the Studapart brand (both on\- and off\-page)
* Conducting regular technical SEO audits and developing recommendations for continuous improvements and optimization to technical teams
* Ensure clear visibility on organic performance in various regions and identify opportunities for market expansion. Ensure this visibility is communicated to key stakeholders in a data\-driven manner
* Work closely with product managers and software engineers to drive the implementation of technical SEO improvements
* Work closely with content marketers by conducting topic, keyword and competitor research
* Manage and improve the extensive SEO toolstack that is in place. Improve data visualization and transform data into actionable insights for yourself and other stakeholders
* Drive targeted domain and page authority through tactical partnerships
* Be an internal ambassador for SEO knowledge
* Stay up to date with the latest SEO trends and best practices and communicate them throughout the organization

  


**Your profile**


* 3\+ years of proven experience in developing and implementing successful SEO strategies (a fast\-paced scale\-up environment is a plus)
* This role requires fluency in French, as well as excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
* Deep understanding of SEO, both technical and non\-technical
* Working experience with the industry tools (OnCrawl, SEO Monitor, Ahrefs or other comparable software)
* Strong analytical skills and data\-driven approach, and ease with advanced data reports
* Strong project management skills
* Ability to work well independently as well as in a team
  


**What's in it for you**


* Unlimited paid holidays, minimum\-based not maximum!
* Hybrid working policy with 2 days working from the office.
* Flexibility to work remotely for up to 2 months per year!
* 1,000 EUR personal development budget.
* Complete coverage for commuting.
* Personal equipment, including laptop and ergonomic setup.
* Gym membership discount with GoVital or OneFit.
* Dutch/English classes budget.
* Variable pension scheme.
* Diverse international community (46\+ nationalities).
* Pet\-friendly office in Rotterdam city center.
* Fun team\-building and after\-work drinks every Friday.

  


**About HousingAnywhere Group**  

HousingAnywhere is Europe's largest mid\-term rental platform, covering over 125 cities across Europe and several in the US. With Kamernet and Studapart under its umbrella, HousingAnywhere empowers people to live wherever and however they choose. Through our advanced online platforms, which together attract over 30 million users annually, we connect young professionals and students directly with accommodation providers. Our team of 250 professionals is dedicated to helping tenants find comfort and peace of mind in their rental search, whether they're looking for a home across the globe or just across town.


**Our mission**  

Rent Easy, Live Free.


**Our Values**


* Ownership
* We are Enablers
* We are Changemakers
* We are Connectors

  



If you have further questions, please email Iris at i.fernandes@housinganywhere.com.

title: Principal Computer Vision Engineer
description:
### **Why join Stryker?**


Looking for a place that values your unique talents? Discover Stryker's award\-winning culture.  

We are proud to offer you our total rewards package which includes bonuses, healthcare, insurance benefits, retirement programs, wellness programs, as well as service and performance awards – not to mention various social and recreational activities, all of which are location specific.### **Job description**


We are excited to be named one of the World’s Best Workplaces by Fortune Magazine!
  

We are proud to offer you our total rewards package which includes bonuses, healthcare, insurance benefits, retirement programs, wellness programs, as well as service and performance awards – not to mention various social and recreational activities, all of which are location specific.  

As a valued member of Stryker’s AI innovation unit, you will work alongside trailblazers, industry visionaries, innovators, and inventors who are committed to bringing computer vision, AI/ML and digital innovation to the operating room and other healthcare settings.

  

You’ll contribute to fast\-paced cycles of innovation and develop core technologies that power a wide array of Stryker’s solutions, including: surgical robotics and navigation, image\-guided surgery, treatment selection, outcome assessment, and clinical decision intelligence. You will apply your core skills across a range of deployment platforms spanning from mobile applications, cloud services, and SDKs to embedded systems, edge devices, and mixed reality (XR) platforms. You will have an opportunity to work across a wide variety of therapeutic areas ranging from orthopaedics and neurosurgery to emergency care and operating room safety and efficiency – plus many more.

  

As a Principal CV Engineer/Scientist, you will play a crucial role in shaping the future of AI\-enhanced healthcare. This high\-visibility position offers an unparalleled opportunity for a technical leader who is passionate about diving deep into the intricacies of computer vision and deep learning problem\-solving while making a significant business impact.

  

Take the leap and join our elite team in the pursuit of revolutionizing healthcare technology. Apply now and become a driving force in the development and deployment of groundbreaking AI solutions!

 **Responsibilities****:**

* Work and collaborate with the CV/ML team to design, prototype, evaluate, optimize, implement and deploy CV/DL algorithms as an integral part of AI\-powered medical technologies for the operating room.
* Participate in cutting\-edge research in computer vision that can be applied to AR/XR product development.
* Design and develop novel computer vision and/or machine learning algorithms in areas such as: real\-time object tracking, scene reconstruction and understanding as well as, segmentation, face tracking, body tracking, key point estimation, depth sensing, generative approaches such as GANs, 3D stereo and volumetric reconstruction, 2D / 3D medical imaging segmentation and rendering.
* Research and prototype state\-of\-the\-art computer vision and deep learning methods to develop solutions that meet product requirements.
* Design algorithm evaluation frameworks, schedule and report algorithm performance evaluation on a regular basis.
* Formulate processes for choosing appropriate sensors based on requirements like cameras and developing image processing algorithms, with an emphasis on classical computer vision, 3D geometry, and deep learning.
* Document and present progress in algorithm design, development, and evaluation (requirements/design/architecture/bugs/tests).
* Lead code reviews for projects/systems as an independent reviewer applying design principles, coding standards and best practices.
 **Minimum Qualification****s** **\& Experience****:**

* Bachelor's degree in software engineering/ Computer Science or related discipline \& 8\+ years of work experience or Master’s / PhD degree in Software engineering/ Computer Science or related discipline \& 6\+ years of work experience
* Industry experiences working on projects such as: real\-time SLAM and 3D reconstruction, sensor fusion and active depth sensing, object and body tracking and pose estimation, and/or image processing. Image and/or semantic segmentation, 2D and 3D key point estimation and surface reconstruction, depth estimation, generative methods such as GANs, or photorealistic rendering.
* 4\+ years of experience coding in Python.
* Practical Experience with C/C\+\+.
* Experience with camera calibration, stereo vision, tracking, 3D points clouds, registration and associated algorithm development.
* Experience with deep learning framework such as PyTorch, Tensorflow, Keras, Caffe, etc., for deep learning model training and deployment.
* 3D Vision and projective geometry.
* Computer Graphics.
* Deep learning/machine learning for computer vision.
* Practical applications of classical computer vision and machine learning techniques.
* Practical experience with computer vision frameworks like OpenCV, Open3D, PCL, etc.
* Experience in designing, training and deploying production\-grade deep learning architectures for computer vision application with a broad under‐standing of latest
* V / DL methods and literature.
* Experience in writing reusable, scalable, test\-driven and well documented codebase.
* Excellent writing and verbal communication skills.
 **Preferred Experience:**

* Previous experience with any head\-mounted (ego\-centric device) or XR platform
* Academic publication in CV/AI conferences / journals such as CVPR, ICCP, ICCV, NeurIPS, etc.

Stryker is a global leader in medical technologies and, together with its customers, is driven to make healthcare better. The company offers innovative products and services in MedSurg, Neurotechnology, Orthopaedics and Spine that help improve patient and healthcare outcomes. Alongside its customers around the world, Stryker impacts more than 150 million patients annually.

title: LLMOps Chapter Lead
description:
As a Chapter Lead you have a dual role. You build a strong\-identity team that apply their diverse skills and perspectives to achieve common goals, actively perform the people management of your chapter members and further develop and safeguard their knowledge and craftsmanship, in this instance for Advanced Analytics. On the other hand, you are spending the majority of your time working together with your team as a contributor on the delivery as well. As a Chapter Lead you have the complete overview and insight on the capabilities, expertise and experience of your chapter members and you will be responsible to decide on allocation of your chapter members capacity for the global backlog delivery demand coming from the Product Lead and Tribe Lead. As Chapter Lead Data Science, you report to the Tribe Lead COO Analytics.
  
  

**Your responsibilities include:**  

Together with the Tribe Lead and Product Lead develop a view on the future of the LLM/ LLMOps capability craftsmanship and drive continues development of your chapter members
  
  

Working closely together with the other Chapter Leads to discuss and align on required capabilities and capacity across chapters for delivery
  
  

Together with the Tribe Lead, Product Lead and other People Leads, decide on the allocation of capacity of your chapter members for the delivery of the global priorities
  
  

Steer and develop your chapter members to meet both their career goals and the organisation’s goals, driving engagement and results via inspiring leadership.
  
  

Act as an expert on the craftmanship development needs for Data Science
  
  

Manage and report on the performance of a substantial, diverse team; set appropriate performance objectives for direct reports or project / account team members and hold them accountable for achieving these
  
  

Work with your colleagues on the (global) backlog deliveries
  
  

Attract and retain the best talents, leading interviews when needed for your chapter
  
  

How to succeed
  
  

MSc or PhD in Computer Science or similar domain, and preferably in Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval, or Machine Learning.
  
  

A minimum of 4 years experience in building Natural Language Processing or Information Retrieval pipelines and models
  
  

Experience with operationalisation of LLMs or Generative AI applications
  
  

You have an in\-depth understanding of algorithms like Conditional Random Fields, Transformers, Recurrent Neural Networks, and Convolutional Neural Network
  
  

Management experience in an Agile organization. Management experience in a matrix set up is a plus.
  
  

A proven track record in analytics, backlog management and resource planning
  
  

Ability to lead teams of experts working in a highly complex and dynamic environment promoting awareness in others
  
  

Achieve optimum results by empowering teams
  
  

Passionate about developing teams to achieve craftmanship and personal development.
  
  

Experience in building “end\-to\-end ML software product” which has NLP/IR component
  
  

You have excellent oral and written communication skills at the technical and business level
  
  

Fluent in written and spoken English.
  
  

Familiarity with Agile Scrum way of working
  
  

Nice To Have
  
  

Experience with Google Cloud Platform
  
  

Experience with applying NLP in banking domain
  
  

Knowledge of DevOps practices including Git and CI/CD
  
  

Experience with CI/CD for Machine Learning pipeline (CD4ML).
  
  

Experience with traditional ML algorithms is a plus
  
  

Rewards and benefits
  
We want to make sure that it’s possible for you to strike the right balance between your career and your private life. You can find out more about our employment conditions at https://careers.ing.com/en/benefits\-NL
  
  

**The benefits of working with us at ING include:**  

A salary range of €6\.176 \- €9\.871
  
  

24\-27 vacation days depending on contract
  
  

Pension scheme
  
  

13th month salary
  
  

Individual Savings Contribution (BIS), 3\.5% of your gross annual salary
  
  

8% Holiday payment
  
  

Hybrid working to blend home working for focus and office working for collaboration and co\-creation
  
  

Personal growth and challenging work with endless possibilities
  
  

An informal working environment with innovative colleagues
  
  

About us
  
With 60,000 employees and operations in approximately 40 countries, there is no shortage of opportunities for people with initiative who want to help people take a step ahead in life and in business. Do you want to work at the cutting edge of what’s possible and at the same time ensure you work with integrity and hold the customer’s interests at heart? Do you want to be surrounded by progressive, inspiring, diverse and supportive colleagues? Then there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING. Join us. Apply today.
  
  

Questions?
  
Contact the recruiter attached to the advertisement for more information. Want to apply directly? Please upload your CV and motivation letter by clicking the “Apply” button.
  
Please note, multiple interview steps involving various business stakeholders will be part of the selection process.

title: Cyber Security Specialist
description:
**Job Description**
-------------------


At Cboe Clear Europe, we inspire our people to solve complex challenges together because what we do matters. We provide the financial infrastructure that powers the global economy. As a leading provider of market infrastructure and tradable products, Cboe delivers cutting\-edge trading, clearing and investment solutions to market participants around the world.

  

We’re building inclusive ways to support professional and personal development while strengthening the trust we’ve earned as a global market leader. Our teams are empowered to share ideas, actively pursue them and bring on a challenge. As champions of internal mobility and access to opportunity, we encourage our people to “go for it” and equip our managers with the training to coach their teams to the next level. Our Associate Resource Groups champion diversity, equity and inclusion, giving associates a safe space to network, share ideas and create opportunities.

  

Sound like the place for you? Join us!

 **Cboe Clear Europe is hiring for** **Cyber Security** **Specialist**

  

As a Security Specialist you play a crucial role in securing our IT infrastructure landscape. You ensure that security is constantly improving, amidst IT transformations such as our journey to the cloud, the implementation of DevOps and an Agile way of working.

  

This role will give you exposure to both legacy and cutting\-edge technologies and work across both Infrastructure, Web, and Cloud. You will be responsible for security implementations, delivering high\-quality services and solutions across all infrastructure and application development platforms. You will perform design reviews of new applications, products, and services to identify potential risks and recommend appropriate mitigations, design approach including the design of the appropriate security testing.

 **In this role** **you’ll****be responsible for**:

* Designing and implementing robust security solutions to protect IT infrastructure and Cloud integrations.
* Participating in infrastructure design reviews and threat modelling sessions, promoting best infrastructure practices.
* Incorporating Generative AI features in design and managing risks.
* Delivering and integrating security tooling into DevOps delivery pipelines.
* Delivering and performing design reviews of new applications, products, and services to identify potential risks and recommend appropriate mitigations.
* Performing security assessments, testing, and manual code reviews of applications.
* Conducting post\-incident root\-cause analysis and developing strategies to prevent recurrence.
* Creating technical security standards for relevant technologies.
* Assisting with the development and delivery of Cboe Clear Europe’s application security strategy.
* Monitoring and driving application security compliance during the project lifecycle.
* Working with stakeholders to implement security solutions and initiatives addressing new vulnerabilities.
* Delivering technical aspects through planning, designing, and building for project and compliance security testing.
* Developing solutions to secure architecture requirements and standards.
* Engaging across multiple functions on a global level to ensure code development lifecycles are in place and application verification is driven through all application development programs.
* Ensuring accurate delivery progress reporting is completed and communicated to relevant stakeholders.
* Implementing and reviewing security controls on other layers of infrastructure, including applications within Kubernetes clusters, service virtual machines, and SaaS.
 **The ideal candidate has**:

* At least 9\+ years of experience in the IT security / network / infrastructure field and 4\+ years of hands\-on experience in information security
* A strong understanding of DevOps principles and how security controls can be effectively integrated into DevOps pipelines
* Knowledge of security aspects of various technologies, including security tooling, authentication/authorization technologies (e.g., OAuth, SAML), and common technologies used to deliver and support applications (e.g., Linux, Windows, databases, load balancers, firewalls, IDS, EDR)
* Familiarity with common application\-related compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, EMIR, DORA)
* Experience in analysing, assessing, and resolving complex technology requirements, problems, and issues
* Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to form strong business relationships across multiple locations and create management reporting to convey operational metrics, trends, or other key information
* Demonstrated strong influencing and persuading skills, encouraging colleagues and teams to change established processes, achieve improvements, and best practices
* A bachelor’s degree in cyber security, network/security engineering, computer science, MIS, CIS, or a related field, or extensive relevant work experience
* Certification in any of the following is preferred: CISSP, CISM, CISA, CCSP, or equivalent.
 **You’ll** **really stand out with**:

* Previous work with a Fin\-Tech company is preferred but not required
* Additional security industry training such as SANS or Offensive Security preferred
* Knowledge of information security concepts and technologies, including cyber risk, third party risk, and security governance
* Knowledge of a wide range of security/risk management frameworks like NIST, CIS etc.
* Cloud security with a special focus on hybrid cloud environments
* Experience with IS documentation, \-report writing, reviewing and consulting
* Stakeholder management skills, especially in a multi\-cultural and international environment.
 **Benefits and Perks**


We value the total wellbeing of our people – including health, financial, personal and social wellness. We believe standard benefits like health insurance and fair pay are a given at any organization. Still, you should know we offer:

* Fair and competitive salary and incentive compensation packages with an upside for overachievement
* Cboe offer pension contributions up to 7% of base salary
* Enhanced paid parental leave to support parents
* Employee Assistance Plan to help employees deal with personal problems that might adversely impact their work performance, health and well\-being. This service includes short\- term counselling and referral services for employees and their immediate family
* Corporate Gym Membership which provides discounted access to gyms, health sport and wellness clubs of different fitness genres across the Netherlands. (taxable benefit)
* 25 days holiday per year per holiday year for full time employees, increasing with length of service at a rate of one extra day per completed years’ service, up to a maximum of 30 days
* Flexible, hybrid work environment, where you choose where and how you work (2/3 days per week in office)
* Discounted Employee Stock Purchase Plan
* Employee referral bonus program
* Complimentary lunch, snacks and drinks in any Cboe office
* Paid tuition assistance and education opportunities
* Generous charitable giving company match
* Volunteer opportunities to help you give back to your communities.
 **More About** **Cboe****Clear** **Europe**


We’re reimagining the future of the workplace by focusing on what matters most, our people. Our journey is an inclusive one. We’re investing deeply in leadership programs and career development initiatives that ensure everyone has an equal chance to succeed. We celebrate the diversity in our communities, inside and out, and welcome new perspectives with equity, inclusion and belonging.


We work with purpose, solving problems with ingenuity, collaboration, and a lot of passion. We’re an engaged and excited team connecting markets across borders and embracing growth in all its forms to achieve incredible outcomes.

  

Learn more about life at Cboe on our website and LinkedIn.

 **Equal Employment Opportunity**


We're proud to be an equal opportunity employer \- and celebrate our associates' differences, including race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age and disability


\#LI\-CP1

 *Any communication from Cboe regarding this position will only come from a Cboe recruiter who has a @cboe.com email or via LinkedIn Recruiter. Cboe does not use any other**third party communication tools for recruiting purposes.*

title: Senior Product Adoption Specialist - Change Management
description:
Do you want to work on complex and pressing challenges—the kind that bring together curious, ambitious, and determined leaders who strive to become better every day? **If this sounds like you, you’ve come to the right place.**
**Your Impact**
---------------


As the Product Adoption Senior Specialist, Change Management, you will join our People Services Enablement team as part of the global People function driving the transformation of our core People and Payroll processes through digital enablement.
You will work with our global People and Payroll communities as we transform the way we provide services to our firm members. The digitization of core People processes is one of the fundamental ways we are professionalizing our firm and creating an unrivaled environment for exceptional firm function talent.
The role will focus on the rollout and implementation of the ServiceNow People \& Payroll product, a part of the firm’s ServiceNow platform, to enable our People and Payroll process transformation. ServiceNow is the firm’s service management platform that provides transparency to work, increases efficiency, and streamlines global processes. We have undergone intense growth over the past 3 years with great success. We have made substantial impact by enabling self\-help and laying the foundation for generative AI (gen AI) and digital workflows which in turn has driven more increased demand for this product and projects continued growth.
For the next horizon of work, you will drive the overall adoption of ServiceNow People \& Payroll, lead change management, and support the People and Payroll functions to fully adopt this digital platform. This includes working directly with our global community of process leads to understand and anticipate impacts and implications of this technology on roles and responsibilities, processes, and workflows. You will shape, develop, and execute a strategy for changing colleague behavior and ensuring sustainable adoption of this platform across all user communities during and beyond initial implementation.
In this role, we will rely upon your passion for learning, passion for helping others, and aptitude to test, fail and try to come up with solutions that help our end users. This role has potential to grow – on the People side: to serve as a thought partner for our global HR, Payroll and People Operations teams to best utilize this digital solution and develop effective user support strategies; on the technical side, to get exposure to product development and system design and recommend enhancements to the product to encourage deeper user adoption.
For the first year in the role, the focus will split. One focus will be on implementations to expand to more groups such as HR and Payroll into Europe, Middle East, Africa, and others as prioritized by our People leaders. A second focus is working with our product team, user researchers and designers to influence product design and development to take into account product adoption. In parallel, you will help support an existing global group of global users that has on\-going training, documentation, and digital platform needs. Since ServiceNow People \& Payroll enables most processes in the People function, you will actively collaborate across a broad set of domains and teams.
**Your Growth**
---------------


As the Product Adoption Specialist, you will be a key member of the People Services Enablement team, which operates within the broader People Technology group and collaborates closely with the Tech Ecosystem. This team bridges the gap between process and technology, leveraging digital tools to drive people and payroll process transformation, achieve business outcomes, and innovate workflows. Covering the entire firm member lifecycle—from talent acquisition and onboarding to learning, professional development, and talent management—you may also partner with other People Technology product teams to ensure seamless integration and support.
In addition to this, you will work closely with the ServiceNow Center of Excellence and Innovation (CoEI), which unifies digital capabilities across the firm, and collaborate with Tech Ecosystem resources like user research and design to ground your change management plans in user insights and thoughtful design.
In this role, you will focus on driving adoption and engagement with the ServiceNow People \& Payroll platform across a globally distributed team in Costa Rica, Czech Republic, Germany, India, Poland, Spain, and the United States. You will design and execute change management plans for global implementations, develop and deliver tailored training programs, and create communication strategies with supporting materials to engage stakeholders. Acting as an expert and advocate for the system, you will provide ongoing coaching to champion user groups, offer guidance to individual users and teams, and address process gaps through digital solutions.
Lastly, you will monitor user metrics to inform strategies, stay updated on product enhancements, and lead efforts to adopt new features, ensuring the platform evolves to meet user needs effectively.
**Your qualifications and skills**
----------------------------------


* 5\+ years of relevant working experience in leading, designing and executing change and/or adoption programs within the firm, for technology products
* Understanding of change methodologies (e.g., Adapt, influence model, Adkar), how McKinsey works, and empathy for McKinsey colleagues in all roles (CSP, FSP, ESP)
* Strength in managing relationships with multiple stakeholder groups, including senior leaders
* Strong problem solving, communication and customer service skills
* Creativity and resourcefulness in helping others and contributing to solutions
* Entrepreneurial and proactive – ability to work independently and drive different work streams
* Strong interest in digital systems, natural technical curiosity
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
* Skills to communicate complex ideas effectively
* Ability to communicate effectively \- both verbally and in writing \- in English
company_description: McKinsey & Company is a privately owned management consulting firm committed to accelerating sustainable and inclusive growth.

title: Full-Stack AI Pioneer & Automation Architect
description:
**Are you ready to build the future, amplified by AI?**‍

Klikkie isn't just about preserving memories; we're about revolutionizing how they're created, curated, and enjoyed, leveraging the full power of Artificial Intelligence across both **web and mobile**. We're launching a wave of innovative products and services, all deeply integrated with AI. To lead this charge, we need a visionary **Full\-Stack AI Pioneer \& Automation Architect**.

This isn't your standard developer role. We're looking for someone who breathes AI – using it not just to code 10x faster, but to architect intelligent automation across *every* department, build AI\-powered tools for internal teams (including **design creation**, **AI\-driven editing**, and **customer support bots**), and contribute to our **React Native** mobile app.

If you see AI as your co\-pilot, design partner, and automation engine, this is your opportunity to define the cutting edge

**Your Mission:**

Become the catalyst for AI adoption and hyper\-efficiency at klikkie. Your goals are ambitious:

* **AI\-Accelerated Development (Web \& Mobile):** Build, iterate, and scale our core platform (TypeScript, React, Node.js) *and* our React Native mobile app at unprecedented speed, leveraging AI coding assistants as fundamental tools.
* **Architect Intelligent Workflows:** Design, build, and implement AI\-powered automation flows across the *entire* company – engineering, marketing, operations, customer support and critically, design and content creation.
* **Pioneer AI\-Powered Features \& Tools:** Spearhead the development of internal tools (e.g., AI\-assisted design templates, automated image editing, customer support chatbots) and external\-facing features (e.g., AI\-enhanced photo products) using various AI models and services.
* **Develop with AI at Your Fingertips:** Write, test, debug, and deploy high\-quality code across the stack (web *and* mobile), making extensive use of AI assistants (Cursor, Copilot, CodeWhisperer, etc.) to achieve maximum velocity and quality.
* **Build AI\-Driven Internal Tools:** Create bespoke applications and workflows that leverage AI for tasks like: **Automated Design Generation:** Utilizing generative AI APIs (e.g., OpenAI DALL\-E, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion). **Intelligent Image Editing:** Integrating AI models for various image manipulation tasks. **Customer Support Automation:** Developing and refining AI chatbots using platforms like **Langflow** to enhance user support efficiency. **Content \& Copy Generation:** Assisting teams with AI text generation tools.
* **Engineer Cross\-Company Automation:** Identify bottlenecks everywhere and replace them with robust, intelligent automation using scripts, APIs, workflow tools n8n, Langflow, and custom integrations.
* **Contribute to Mobile Development:** Work on our React Native application, bringing your full\-stack and AI mindset to our mobile experience.
* **Integrate Diverse AI Services:** Connect our platforms with various AI APIs and services (e.g., LLMs, Vision APIs, Vector Databases).
* **Optimize Cloud \& Infrastructure with Automation:** Manage and improve our GCP infrastructure with a relentless focus on automation.
* **Champion AI \& Efficiency:** Stay ahead of the curve on AI advancements, share knowledge, and inspire the entire company.

**Who You Are:**

* **Rock\-Solid Full\-Stack Engineer:** Deep expertise in **TypeScript, React, and Node.js**. Proven experience building robust web applications.
* **Mobile Development Experience:** Comfortable working with **React Native** to build or enhance mobile app features.
* **AI Development Pro:** You treat tools like **Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Tabnine, Cody, or CodeWhisperer** as indispensable. Ideally, you have 10 years of experience with Cursor... calculated in *effective developer compute time*, naturally. You demonstrably achieve (or strive for) 10x productivity through smart AI usage.
* **Automation Visionary:** Proven track record or intense passion for automating processes. Experience with **Python/Bash scripting, API integrations, serverless functions, and workflow tools (n8n, Zapier, Make, Retool)** is essential. Familiarity or strong interest in visual flow builders like **Langflow** is a plus.
* **AI Integration Experience:** You've worked with or are keenly interested in integrating various AI APIs/models (e.g., **OpenAI, Anthropic, Google AI, generative image models, Cloud Vision APIs, Vector DBs**).
* **Creative Problem Solver:** You can apply AI and automation to novel challenges, including design, image editing, and customer interaction.
* **Proactive \& Impact\-Driven:** You hunt down opportunities for efficiency gains and game\-changing features.
* **Tech Stack Versatility:** Comfortable navigating **Next.js, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, React Native, and major cloud platforms (AWS/GCP)**.
* **Clear Communicator:** You can articulate complex AI concepts and automation benefits effectively.

**About us**

Although we take more photos now than ever, we seldom print them out. This neglects all the beautiful captured moments, as among these numerous photos lie precious memories worth printing. Be it the first pictures of your newborn, your niece or nephew, the amazing city trip with friends, or a fun night out.

With klikkie, we help you celebrate life and cherish memories. We aim to inspire you to make time for small moments and enjoy the present – what truly matters. Every month brings new moments, and it's a shame to forget them. Hence, the idea is to enable everyone to print high\-quality photos with minimal effort, month after month.

title: Master's thesis in Data & AI: Low-poly 3D models to...
description:
**Examining Parkinson’s symptoms is labor\-intensive and constrained by a shortage of neurologists in underserved regions. In this thesis, you will generate synthetic training data by transforming low\-poly 3D models of hands and feet into photorealistic images with labeled key points. Using techniques like pix2pix GANs, you’ll explore and optimize the process to create a diverse and enriched dataset, enhancing pose estimation models for AI\-driven Parkinson’s symptom analysis.**

**Areas of Interest:** Generative AI, Controllable Image Generation, Few\-shot Learning


This master’s thesis is part of the graduation project ‘Ontzorg de zorg, zorg voor jezelf!’. This project gives the healthcare sector a digital boost through automation and data analysis, allowing caregivers to spend more time with patients while enabling patients to take control of their personal health data.


The examination of Parkinson’s symptoms is highly labor\-intensive, as it requires multiple trained neurologists to thoroughly analyze hand and leg movements. A group of hospitals aims to extend Parkinson’s treatment in the Netherlands to regions where such care is currently unavailable due to a shortage of trained neurologists. To achieve this, they want to make a pre\-selection through the help of AI on a smartphone. Part of the solution is a pose estimation model to track hand and foot movements. However, the current dataset for training the model is neither large nor diverse enough. The goal is to enrich the dataset with highly varied data while minimizing the need for manual effort.


Important features for detecting hands and feet could be better balanced by enriching the training dataset with synthetic data. To prevent manual labeling of the training data, it would be ideal if the ground truth for tracking key points is synthesized along with the training images. By converting low\-poly 3D models with key point rigs into photorealistic images, a synthetic dataset of labeled training images could be generated. Your task will be to investigate how to transform low\-poly models into photorealistic images using AI.

**The Assignment**
------------------


You will create a training dataset consisting of low\-poly 3D body rigs, focusing on the hands and feet. Next, you will explore transforming these low\-poly models into photorealistic images using a pix2pix GAN model. You may also fine\-tune the model to optimize hyperparameters for generating the best results. Your findings will be documented in a thesis and presented during your thesis defense.

**About Info Support Research Center**
--------------------------------------


We anticipate on upcoming and future challenges and ensures our engineers develop cutting\-edge solutions based on the latest scientific insights. Our research community proactively tackles emerging technologies. We do this in cooperation with renowned scientists, making sure that research teams are positioned and embedded throughout our organisation and our community, so that their insights are directly applied to our business. We truly believe in sharing knowledge, so we want to do this without any restrictions.


Read more about Info Support Research here.


**About Info Support**


Info Support specializes in custom software, data/AI solutions, management, and training and is active in the Finance, Industry, Agriculture, Food \& Retail, Mobility \& Public, and Healthcare sectors. We provide solid and innovative solutions for complex and critical software issues. Our headquarters are located in Veenendaal (NL) and Mechelen (BE). At present, approximately 500 employees are employed by Info Support.


Info Support's working method is characterized by a number of core values: solidity, integrity, craftsmanship, and passion. These core values are intertwined in our work and the way we interact with each other.


To ensure that all employees are always up to date with the latest developments, Info Support has an in\-house knowledge center that eagerly satisfies the hunger for more or different knowledge and skills.


B2 language proficiency in Dutch is required.
company_description: Info Support is de specialist in het ontwikkelen van hoogwaardige softwareoplossingen en leidend op het gebied van kunstmatige intelligentie, cloud architectuur, Managed Services en IT-trainingen.
